title: Which apple laptop is ideal for student? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the major, really. If your studies don’t require heavy processing, but something that’s lightweight and has great battery life, then you’ll pick a Macbook Air. If you do want to run complex software that needs powerful hardware, then you’ll opt for a Macbook Pro. It’s as easy as that! Also, here’s a guide that’s better suited to guide you: Student Computing Gear - Best Laptops for College The guide is broken down into a few common majors with laptop recommendations for each.

Go only for Macbook Air or Macbook Pro. Dont buy macbook. If you can spend, then go for pro as it has both, good processing power and are lightweight. All macbooks are of top quality that can easily last for 5+ yrs. And they have great battery backup. (macbook air have more the 10+ hours of backup). If you are comp science graduate or use your laptop for heavy programming or video and pics editing, definitely go for Pro.
